name: Ganttic
overview:
Ganttic is universal planning tool which does an equally great job at scheduling people, projects, facilities and equipment. Visual planning and scheduling with drag & drop simplicity. SIEMENS, Imtech, Exide are already using it.

— SOCIAL PROOF —

We’ve had media coverage from Forbes, NYTimes and GigaOM

— WHY SHOULD ANYONE USE GANTTIC? —

Planning and scheduling in businesses is as inevitable as bookkeeping. Still, most small businesses are not doing it at all, because plans change all the time and rescheduling them with traditional planning tools is time consuming. Ganttic has solved it and customers approved our solution.

— MORE ABOUT THE TEAM —

Our team has been developing and selling specialized software for timber industry since 2002. WoodWare Systems was founded in April 2005. In early 2008 we introduced a beta version of YUTITI - a web based resource planning tool. Thanks to Woodware we have 9 years of experience in business software development and implementation in various companies.

Our vision: We want to expand the market of resource scheduling software by providing an affordable and usable tool to businesses for who planning tools were missing or inaccessible.
